verses.verse: And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I were as in <S%H3391>months<s%> <S%H6924>gone<s%> by, As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H8104>watched<s%> over me;
When His <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H9096>shone<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head,<s%> [And] by His <S%H216>light<s%> I <S%H1980>walked<s%> through <S%H2822>darkness;<s%>
As I was in the <S%H2779>prime<s%> of my <S%H3117>days,<s%> When the <S%H5475>friendship<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> [was] <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H168>tent;<s%>
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> with me, [And] my <S%H5288>children<s%> were <S%H5439>around<s%> me;
When my <S%H1978>steps<s%> were <S%H7364>bathed<s%> in <S%H2529>butter,<s%> And the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H6694>poured<s%> out for me <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H8081>oil!<s%>
"When I <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%> When I <S%H3559>took<s%> my <S%H4186>seat<s%> in the <S%H7339>square;<s%>
The <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> me and <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves, And the <S%H3453>old<s%> <S%H3453>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> [and] <S%H5975>stood.<s%>
"The <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H6113>stopped<s%> <S%H4405>talking,<s%> And <S%H7760>put<s%> [their] <S%H3709>hands<s%> on their <S%H6310>mouths;<s%>
The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5057>nobles<s%> was <S%H2244>hushed,<s%> And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stuck<s%> to their <S%H2441>palate.<s%>
"For when the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%> it <S%H833>called<s%> me <S%H833>blessed;<s%> And when the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> it <S%H5749>gave<s%> <S%H5749>witness<s%> of me,
<S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> who <S%H7768>cried<s%> for <S%H7768>help,<s%> And the <S%H3490>orphan<s%> who had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
"The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the one ready to perish <S%H6>came<s%> upon me, And I made the widow's <S%H935>heart<s%> <S%H3820>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>
"I <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and it <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me; My <S%H4941>justice<s%> was like a <S%H4598>robe<s%> and a <S%H6797>turban.<s%>
"I was <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> And <S%H7272>feet<s%> to the <S%H6455>lame.<s%>
"I was a father to the <S%H1>needy,<s%> And I <S%H34>investigated<s%> the <S%H2713>case<s%> which I did not <S%H7379>know.<s%>
"And I <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H4973>jaws<s%> of the <S%H5767>wicked,<s%> And <S%H7993>snatched<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> from his <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
"Then I <S%H559>thought,<s%> 'I shall <S%H1478>die<s%> in my <S%H7064>nest,<s%> And I shall <S%H7235>multiply<s%> [my] <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>
'My <S%H8328>root<s%> is <S%H6605>spread<s%> out to the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> And <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H3885>lies<s%> all <S%H3885>night<s%> on my <S%H9524>branch.<s%>
'My <S%H9202>glory<s%> is [ever] <S%H2319>new<s%> with me, And my <S%H7198>bow<s%> is <S%H2498>renewed<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>'
"To me they <S%H8085>listened<s%> and <S%H3176>waited,<s%> And <S%H1826>kept<s%> <S%H1826>silent<s%> for my <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
<S%H310>"After<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> they did not <S%H8138>speak<s%> <S%H8138>again,<s%> And my <S%H4405>speech<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> on them.
"And they <S%H3176>waited<s%> for me as for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> And <S%H6473>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> as for the <S%H4456>spring<s%> <S%H4456>rain.<s%>
"I <S%H7832>smiled<s%> on them when they did not <S%H539>believe,<s%> And the <S%H216>light<s%> of my <S%H6440>face<s%> they did not <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down.<s%>

"I <S%H977>chose<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for them and <S%H3427>sat<s%> as <S%H7218>chief,<s%> And <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> as a <S%H4428>king<s%> among the <S%H1416>troops,<s%> As one <S%H9201>who<s%> <S%H5162>comforted<s%> the <S%H57>mourners.<s%>
